about_the_game:
Tag League is an online PvP parkour game where you must use your movement and traversal skills to gain an advantage and beat the other team. Gather your friends and lobby up to play a selection of fun game modes where your parkour skill and movement come into play to experience these game modes to the fullest. With a wide range of motion, these classic modes are more exciting than ever...

I am a solo developer on this project and also plan on adding many more features and modes to the game throughout the cycle of early access.

TAG GAME MODE



Battle it out in the 1v1/2v2 Tag game mode. Take turns playing the role of the tagger or runner and climb the scoreboard!

JOIN THE DISCORD COMMUNITY!



Join now to connect with players, whether that's to host lobbies or host discussions.

FREE RANGE PARKOUR MOVEMENT



Use bounce pads located around the map to gain a height advantage and reposition to avoid or gain leverage on your opponents.

Game Features:
Online Multiplayer
PvP
Climbing
Vaulting
Arena Map
Open Area Map
Tag Game Mode
Dynamite Game Mode
Capture the Flag Game Mode

name: Tag League

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Tag League is an online PvP parkour game where you must use your movement and traversal skills to gain an advantage and beat the other team.
